channel.title: MoparScape 3.2 w- Aryan starting new account or new character?
channel.description:
I put this here because I could not find any topics that matched mine, anywhere else on this site and I have been looking for some weeks
I downloaded MoparScape 3.2 w- Aryan and installed it.
It runs good, but the game starts with a character that has max skill XP-level, Total level, Combat level, all attack spells and is at Varrock minning area.
I have tied to edit different files, to give me a low level character starting at Lumbridge, then I log back in and I get an error player already login, so now I have to delete all the files for my character, then I can start a new account but it starts again with maxed out character.
I want to start a new low level character at Lumbridge, so that I can work on building up my character's skills and level.!!!!!
